bibl.title: A petition to the iuridicus from the archive of Ptolemaios, son of Diodoros (147 CE, Theadelphia)
bibl.seg: Uri Yiftach, A Petition to the Iuridicus from the Archive of Ptolemaios, Son of Diodoros (147 CE, Theadelphia).
bibl.note: P. Col. Inv. 28. Theadelphia, Sept.-Oct. 147. The text was probably drafted by Ptolemaios, son of Diodoros, whose archive has so far yielded 22 texts. An earlier draft of a petition relating to the same dispute has recently been published as P.S.I. XVII, 1689. - The Court. - The Case. - The Litigants.
